root.message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 4-2-1, translated into all languages

languages.language:
Data availability:

Data on the indicator collected through implementation of the ECDI2030 are expected to become available beginning in 2021. Comparable data collected by the ECDI are currently available for close to 80 countries. Countries with data on the proxy indicator collected with the ECDI will continue to be used for global SDG reporting until new data using the ECDI2030 are available.

Time series:

Not available

Disaggregation:

Sex
